ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not one of my regulars, what do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是我的常客，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在真的很忙，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THIS IS RAILWAY PROPERTY, UNDER HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS YOU REQUIRE A VALID WORK PERMIT TO PROCEEED.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是铁路财产，根据健康和安全法规，你需要有效的工作许可才能进行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: FAILURE TO PRODUCE A VALID WORK PERMIT MAY RESULT IN ARREST, PROSECUTION, AND, UNDER CURRENT EMERGENCY GUIDELINES, EXECUTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 未能出示有效的工作许可证可能会导致逮捕、起诉，并在目前的紧急准则下被处决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want now, smoothskin?
Welcome to Rita's Cafe, feel free to relax and look around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎光临丽塔咖啡馆，请尽情放松，随便看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Break any of our laws and we'll kill you. You have a nice day now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 违反我们的任何法律，我们都会杀了你。祝你今天过得愉快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPokeQuest01.MetBlinder to 1 ZkbBlinderGreetActREF.Disable ZkbBlinderGreetActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbBlinderPokeREF.evp
I have to get back to work, catch me in the hotel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得回去工作了，在旅馆找我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you like our burglar alarm? Smarts, don't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢我们的防盗报警器吗？是不是很聪明？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're back, what is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你回来了，是什么事呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, if you want to buy something from my shop, you'll have to wait until it opens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果你想从我的商店买东西，你必须等到它开门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, got work to take care of.
What the fuck do you want?
Hi, stranger! I'm Blue Ray, and welcome to Blue Ray's Trading. What can I sell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，陌生人！我是蓝光，欢迎来到蓝光贸易公司。我能卖给你什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back friend, how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来朋友，我能为你做些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, as long as you behave I'll deal with you, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，只要你表现好，我就会和你打交道，OK？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you just crawled out of the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像刚从沙漠里爬出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh great, just who I wanted to see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太好了，正是我想见到的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feeling thirsty? I can take care of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 口渴了吗？ 我可以解决这个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything with this old pump action shotgun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能用这把老式泵动霰弹枪做什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I can turn it into a semi-automatic if you have the cash. A thousand caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果你有现金的话，我可以把它变成半自动的。1000瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, since it's you, five hundred then.
Player.RemoveItem Caps001 500 Player.RemoveItem ZkbWeapPumpActionShotgun 1 Player.AddItem ZkbWeapAutoShotgun 1 80
I'll give you five hundred, nothing more
Player.RemoveItem Caps001 1000 Player.RemoveItem ZkbWeapPumpActionShotgun 1 Player.AddItem ZkbWeapAutoShotgun 1 80
PLEASE STAND BY TO BE ARRESTED AND/OR EXECUTED.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请准备好接受逮捕和/或处决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMEMBER, YOUR SAFETY IS OUR PRIORITY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住，你的安全是我们的首要任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh...are you serious? I don't think any trains have run here for about two hundred years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...你是认真的吗？我不认为有火车能在这里运行大约两百年。

ESP.ORIGINAL: THIS IS DUE TO SIGNAL FAILURE IN LAS VEGAS. WE APOLOGIZE FOR THE INCONVENIENCE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是由于拉斯维加斯的信号故障。给你带来不便，我们深表歉意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not working, I'm lost. I'll just go back the way I came, bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不工作了，我迷路了。我还是原路返回吧，再见！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apology accepted, can I go now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接受道歉，我可以走了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: FAILURE TO PRODUCE A VALID WORK PERMIT MAY RESULT IN ARREST, PROSECUTION, AND, UNDER CURRENT EMERGENCY GUIDELINES, EXECUTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 未能出示有效的工作许可证可能会导致逮捕、起诉，并在目前的紧急准则下被处决。
记住：安全永远是第一位的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: SAFETY RULES ARE YOUR BEST TOOLS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安全规则是你最好的工具。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just passing through, just like you I assume?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是路过，我猜就像你一样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just trying to get some directions for the road ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想为未来的道路找到一些方向。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with the NCR, we're checking out the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是NCR的人，我们正在检查这个地区。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dumb question, but is the road ahead dangerous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是个蠢问题，但前面的路有危险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of work permit are we talking about here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这里讨论的是什么样的工作许可？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A VALID WORK PERMIT CONSISTS OF THE FOLLOWING:
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个有效的工作许可包括以下内容：

ESP.ORIGINAL: A PERSONAL TRACK SAFETY CARD AND WORK SITE INDUCTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 个人轨道安全卡和工作场所的感应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A WORK PACKAGE PLAN, TASK BRIEFING SHEET AND A SAFE SYSTEM OF WORK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作计划包、任务简报表和安全工作系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND A WORK PACK CONTAINING HAZARD DIRECTORY, SECTIONAL APPENDIX, AND SIGNALING PLAN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以及包含危险目录、分区附录和信号计划的工作包。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you miss the whole "No trains for two centuries" part?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是否错过了 "两个世纪都没有火车 "的部分？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DON'T BE HASTY WHEN IT COMES TO SAFETY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在安全问题上不要草率行事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Why am I even trying to reason with a dumb fucking robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我为什么要和一个该死的哑巴机器人讲道理呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: BE A SAFETY HERO, SCORE AN ACCIDENT ZERO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做一个安全英雄，事故为零。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're just gonna keep doing this forever, huh? Better than trying to kill all humans, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你要永远这样下去，是吧？我想这比试图杀死所有人类要好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: AVOID THE WORST, PUT SAFETY FIRST.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避免最坏的情况，把安全放在第一位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you, uh...you keep doing you, buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你，呃...你继续做你自己，伙计。
保持警惕！事故会造成损失！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, or I could just smash your screen in and bury you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，或者我可以把你的屏幕砸碎，把你埋了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU WILL ALSO REQUIRE A BURIED SERVICES SHEET AND A PERMIT TO DIG.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还需要一份埋藏服务表和挖掘许可证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So...hey, if you need a work permit, where's YOURS?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...嘿，如果你需要工作许可，那你的工作许可在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbNSC247REF.CIOS ZkbParalysis Playsound ZkbSpark01 Set ZkbNSC247Quest01.MetNSC247 to 1 Set ZkbNSC247Quest01.Greet to 0
I tried talking to Blue Ray, he wouldn't tell me shit unless I bought something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着和蓝光交谈，他什么都不告诉我，除非我买东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not surprised, he is a stubborn greedy bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不感到惊讶，他是一个顽固贪婪的杂种。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to know?
I'm, uh, prospecting. Haven't found much though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在，呃，勘探。不过还没有发现什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Well, spare me the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。好吧，别告诉我细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you got any advice for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你有什么建议给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard there's a Vault around here somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说这附近有个避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've thought about looking for it.
Then you're dumber than you look, smoothskin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你比看起来还要蠢，滑皮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything interesting around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这附近有什么有趣的事情吗？
这附近有掠夺者吗？部落呢...？
那么...你为什么在这里呢？
那么，你在这里有什么事呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah-ah! Back off and leave me alone.
I need to make sure there's no trouble around here, clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要确保这里没有任何麻烦，明白吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat shit and die. That clear enough for you!?
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃屎然后去死，这对你来说够清楚了吧！？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's either me or the wasteland, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么是我，要么是废土，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll take my chances with the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还是在废土上碰碰运气吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're awfully cocky for a zombie in a town surrounded by smoothskins. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个被滑皮包围的小镇僵尸来说，你太狂妄了。我只是说说而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbBurgessQuest01.BurgessPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbBurgessQuest01.BurgessGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed ZkbBurgessREF.evp
How about this - start co-operating or I put my boot all the way up your nasty zombie ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧 - 开始合作，否则我就把我的靴子踹到你这个讨厌的僵尸屁股上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Well, this has been a scintillating conversation, but I guess I'll be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: ......好吧，这真是个令人振奋的对话，但我想我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I'm starting to think I'm wasting my time talking to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我开始觉得和你说话是在浪费时间了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a real piece of work.
I'm a railway health and safety inspector. Please present a vaild, up-to-date work permit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一名铁路健康和安全检查员。请出示有效的、最新的工作许可证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbNSC247REF.CIOS ZkbParalysis Playsound ZkbSpark01 Set ZkbNSC247Quest01.Greet to 0

ESP.TRADUIT: 哪儿也不去，只是四处看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay out of trouble, we have enough problems here as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别惹麻烦，我们这里的问题已经够多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was planning on heading through that gate. Is there a toll?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正打算从那个门进去，要收费吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I hope you're looking to do some business with me. I think it could be...mutually beneficial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我希望你想和我做些生意，我认为这是双赢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we talking? Would 100 cover it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在说什么？100瓶盖够吗？？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem Caps001 100 Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete
Or, how about you take 20 caps, and I don't tell your CO you're skimming the toll money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，你拿20瓶盖，我不告诉你的长官你在贪污通行费，怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...You're a cheap bastard. Like all Mojave people.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你是个卑鄙的杂碎，就像所有莫哈韦人一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem Caps001 20 Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete
Now you start talking real clear - and I mean fucking CRYSTAL clear - because I'm about to lose my patience!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在开始你得说清楚 - 我是说他妈的一清二楚，因为我快要失去耐心了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, I just don’t have the money right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我只是现在没有钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move along, waster. Consider yourself lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往前走吧废物，自以为幸运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] All right smart-ass, I get it, you don't answer to us. But get this straight, you'll get eaten alive if you go up that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，聪明的混蛋，我明白了，你不用回答我们的问题，但你得弄清楚，如果你往那边走，你会被生吞活剥的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're on the wrong side of the fence to stop me from going anywhere, soldier boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你站错边了，来阻止我去任何地方试试，士兵小子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back off, or I'll...hurt you, and stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后，否则我就...伤害你之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete
[NCR] Relax, I'm with the NCR. How are things up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR] 放松，我是NCR的人。这里的情况如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the worst detail in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是莫哈韦地区最糟糕的细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got to piss someone off to pull guard duty out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须把某人惹毛，才能在这里担任警卫任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's on the other side of that gate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，那扇门的另一边是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea, I just go and do what they tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我只是去做他们告诉我的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's the way I'm going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就是我要走的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete
[Terrifying Presence] Wherever the hell I want, fuckstick. Try and stop me, I dare you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可怕的存在]我想去哪就去哪，混蛋。拦我试试看，我看你敢不敢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete
Told you, stuck your nose into where it doesn't belong and you got zapped by my burglar alarm. Now what did I tell you when you first arrived?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说过了，你去了不该去的地方，被我的防盗报警器击中了。你刚来的时候我怎么跟你说的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sitting on it. Bet you had it all set up just as you liked it, that’s got to be so annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我坐在上面，你把一切都安排好了，就像你喜欢的那样，这一定很烦人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, let me out, give me my stuff back and you’ll never see me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你吧，让我出去，把我的东西还给我，你就不会再见到我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, If only it was that easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，要是有那么简单就好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me out now, or I'm going to kill the fucking lot of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在让我出去，否则我就杀了你们这些该死的家伙！

ESP.ORIGINAL: From inside a cage? Ever heard the phrase "situational awareness"? You need to work on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从笼子里？你听过态势感知这个词吗？你需要在这方面下点功夫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, I screwed up. Can we work out a deal here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我搞砸了。我们能做个交易吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can, you do seem to be a pretty determined character and you have managed to find our "Ground House" mystery tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以，你看起来确实是一个非常坚定的人物，你已经设法找到了我们的“地上小屋”神秘隧道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, I'll give you a crack at our secret tunnel, but you have to do something for us first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，我给你一个进入我们秘密隧道的机会，但你必须先为我们做一件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think your options are limited here.
There is a place, a field above the waterfall. We use to keep Lurks there. Mean critters but they taste good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瀑布上方有个地方，一片田野。我们曾经在那里养过沼蟹，卑鄙的小动物，但它们味道很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there was a problem, there are these weird poisonous plants. They have always been around but they were becoming a problem. Killing hatchlings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有一个问题，那里有一些奇怪的有毒植物。它们一直都存在，但它们正在成为一个问题，杀害孵化的幼苗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We hired a group of raiders to clear them out, thought it would be simple and it didn’t matter if there were casualties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们雇了一群掠夺者来清除它们，以为会很简单，就算有伤亡也没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they didn’t come back. When we eventually went up to check we found that they had turned green and had leaves growing out of their heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们没有回来。当我们最终上去查看时，发现他们已经变成了绿色，脑袋里长出了叶子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of us saw that one coming. Granted we made the assumption they were what's left of the raiders, although they did seem slightly more intelligent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都没有看到这一幕，我们假设他们是剩下的掠夺者，尽管他们看起来确实稍微聪明一些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Twenty raiders had taken on ten vegetables and lost. They sure couldn't get any more stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二十个掠夺者对付十个蔬菜，结果输了。还有更蠢的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The deal is this; you go up there kill all of these creatures and the plants and then we will see about cutting you in on our mystery tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交易是这样的：你上去杀了所有的生物和植物，然后我们会把你带进我们的神秘通道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen those things before, there's a Vault down south that's full of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前见过这些东西，南方有一个避难所，里面全是这些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I’m talking to the the right person then.
How do you know I won't just bail on you if you let me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道如果你让我出去，我不会抛弃你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't. I'll take that chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我得冒这个险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make a persuasive argument. I'm in. I'll need my stuff back though, obviously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很有说服力，我加入。不过很明显，我需要拿回我的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I've written the details down for you as listening isn't your strong point. Come see me when you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我把细节都给你写下来了，因为听不是你的强项，搞定后来找我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPokeQuest01.Thief to 2 ; Variable to control which packages run Player.AddNote ZkbBlinderQuestANote1 Player.AddItem ZkbKeyRCCave 1 ZkbRCJailDoorREF.Unlock ; Jail cell door ZkbRCShack06DoorInt.Unlock ; Sheriffs office int door ZkbBlinderPokeREF.AddItem GlassesNCRRangerCivilian 1 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 10 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.evp ZkbPearsonBentREF.evp
It's done. Lillypad field is cleared of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成了，睡莲叶田里的那些东西都被清除了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's with all the junk in here, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这里怎么会有这么多垃圾呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a scientist, these are my instruments. ...Stop giggling!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个科学家，这些是我的仪器...别笑了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a place to crash, is this a hotel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找一个地方睡觉，这是个旅馆吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nearest you're gonna get to it in these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一带你能找到的最接近它的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prices are on the board, read them. If you can't read take a guess. You want a one bed cage or a two? Or just a bed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 价格就在黑板上，自己看，如果你不识字，就猜一猜。你要一张床的还是两张床的？还是只要张床？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cage? Is a room too much to ask for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个笼子？一个房间的要求太高了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it is. So is on suite facilities, room service and pleasant after dinner conversation. So what's it to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，套房设施、客房服务和愉快的晚餐后谈话也是如此。所以要什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, Cage E. It's down there, fifth cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，E号笼子，在下面，第五个笼子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCHotelCageEREF.Unlock ZkbRCHotelBedE1REF.SetOwnership Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageE to 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 40
Sure, Cage B, down there second on the right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，B号笼子，下面右边第二个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCHotelCageBREF.Unlock ZkbRCHotelBedB1REF.SetOwnership ZkbRCHotelBedB2REF.SetOwnership DontTazeMeBroFaction Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageB to 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 60
Go right down the end, cage H. Take any one free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那头下去，H号笼子，随便找一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCHotelBedH1REF.SetOwnership ZkbRCHotelBedH2REF.SetOwnership DontTazeMeBroFaction ZkbRCHotelBedH3REF.SetOwnership DontTazeMeBroFaction Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageH to 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 20
Not really, I'm more wholesale. Bill up on the road is your best bet for clothing and weapons, or John for parts, junk and general repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不做，我更喜欢批发。买衣服和武器最好的选择是路上的比尔，买零件、垃圾和一般修理最好的选择则是约翰。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some questions?
Knock yourself out, but I don't guarantee an answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请便，但我不保证会有答案。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come this place is here?
Can't think of a better place for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想不到有比这更好的地方了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever come across a Vault around these parts?
Rarely. And those are generally deserters, lost, or most likely both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很少。而那些人一般都是逃兵、迷路者，或者可能两者都是。
有没有遇到过凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, Legion. Vicious, wear skirts and don't make any sense if you talk to them. Sounds like a lot of the women I've known. None here though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...军团，凶恶，穿裙子，如果你和他们说话，没有任何意义，听起来像是我认识的很多女人。不过这里没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you heard of New Vegas and Mr. House up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里听说过新维加斯和豪斯先生吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course we have, everyone knows about Vegas and the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，大家都知道拉斯维加斯和长街。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for House, I heard he's actually a pre-War computer. Probably spends all day in that tower of his de-fragmenting himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于豪斯，我听说他实际上是一台战前的电脑。可能整天都在他的塔里给自己去碎片化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen any Brotherhood of Steel in these parts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一带看到过钢铁兄弟会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't seen them around for a long time. Probably disappeared down a hole, best place for them if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很久没见到他们了。可能消失在一个洞里了，要我说，那是最适合他们的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for someone to shoot at, there's the Mayor or the Sheriff. Or both, if you've had a bad day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想找个人开枪，你可以找市长或警长，如果你今天过得不好，也可以两个都找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nowhere, it's collapsed further on down. No treasure, no zombies, nowhere and nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪儿也不是，它已经塌了。没有宝藏，没有僵尸，没有目的地，什么都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if this is Rita's Cafe, where is Rita?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果这里是丽塔咖啡馆，丽塔在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Down the hall, fourth on the right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺着走廊走，右边第四个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...How have you got this far being that stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么蠢是怎么走到今天的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't asked me anything, don't you want to know what's happening down south?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都没问我，难道你不想知道南方发生了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all people talk about around here. Anyway, I don't need to. See that box that makes noise behind me? It's called a ray-dee-oh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人都在谈论这个。无所谓，我不需要，看到我身后那个发出声音的盒子了吗？它叫收-音-机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlike you, it has the added advantage of having an off switch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你不同，它有一个额外的优点，那就是有开关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What the hell is wrong with your voice? And why are you so small?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你的声音到底是怎么了？还有，你为什么这么小？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not small! I'm compact, and there is nothing is wrong with my voice. Now are you prepared to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不小，我结构紧凑，我的声音没有问题。现在你准备好去死了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you breathing helium through that mask or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在用面罩吸氦气吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's...not a real thing. Helium is dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...不是真的，氦太危险了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're some kind of failed mutant experiment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是某种失败的变种人试验品？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well excuuuuse me. I'll try to be more politically correct. Freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好吧，请~原谅我。我会试着在政治上更加正确一点的，怪胎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well aren't you the vindictive one? Let me guess, one munchkin joke too many?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不是个报复心很强的人吗？让我猜猜，一个小矮人笑话太多了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think you need to be put out of your misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我认为需要让你摆脱痛苦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, what do you call a green Nightkin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你怎么称呼一个绿色的夜行族？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A munchkin! Get it!? Ah man, I kill myself sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个小矮人！明白吗？啊，伙计，我有时会杀了自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you deliberately trying to antagonize me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是故意要跟我作对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Snicker* Hey, say you're gonna rip my arms off!
ESP.TRADUIT: *窃笑* 嘿，说你要把我的胳膊扯下来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you want me to threaten you!?
Sure, I've never been threatened by a munchkin before, this is priceless!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我从来没被小矮人威胁过，这可是无价之宝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I'm trying to intimidate and kill you, and it's not easy with my disadvantages!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我正试图恐吓和杀死你，以我的劣势，这并不容易！你知道吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So will you please throw me a friggin' bone here and at least try to look worried!?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你能不能给我点面子，至少装出一副害怕的样子！？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about that, will it help if I stop laughing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，如果我不笑了，会好点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So...are we gonna fight now? Or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...我们现在要打架吗？还是...？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't be bothered now. I've lost the moment and am too disillusioned!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在没空。我失去了那一刻，我的幻想破灭了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Well, that conversation went from a hundred to zero pretty quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...好吧，我们的对话从一开始就是一百比零。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, you don't seem to be fazed by mutants, would you be interested in some work at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你似乎没有被变种人吓倒，你对一些工作是否有兴趣？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're...offering me work? You do know I killed most of your buddies on my way in here, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你......给我提供工作？你知道我在来这里的路上杀了你大部分的朋友，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? They were not really my friends and they also seemed to find my "condition" amusing. So...fuck em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？他们并不是我真正的朋友，他们似乎也觉得我的“状况”很有趣。所以...去他妈的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, since you have already solved that problem for me, here is a little reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然你已经帮我解决了这个问题，给你一点奖励。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its the key to Fent's workshop. It's where those idiots stashed their shiny things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是芬特工作室的钥匙。那帮白痴把闪闪发亮的东西藏在那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. So...how's the weather down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。所以...那里的天气怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I hope you get eaten by a Deathclaw.
player.additem ZkbKeyFents 1 ZkbNevilleREF.Removeitem ZkbKeyFents 1 StopQuest ZkbNevilleTaskQuest01
I can see their point, but what's in it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白他们的意思，但这对我有什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their ill gotten gains. They keep it in Fent's so-called workshop and I've made a copy of the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是他们的不义之财。他们把它放在芬特所谓的工作室里，我复制了一把钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fent hides the other one so don't bother looking for it. Kill them and you get the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 芬特把另一把藏起来了，所以不用费心找了。杀了他们，你就能拿到钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can find them either around the quarry or the poison pond just to the west of here, but they shouldn't be too far away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在采石场或西面的毒池附近找到它们，但它们应该离得不远。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, is this job cookie related?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这份工作和饼干有关吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Err no, well you may or may not have noticed there are quite a few other mutants in this quarry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...不，你可能已经注意到了，在这个采石场还有不少其他变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I want you to kill them. Three of them in particular. Benz, Dr. Fent and Dixie the Troll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我要你杀了他们，特别是其中三个：本茨，芬特博士和巨魔迪克西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, it's been...interesting meeting you, but I've gotta get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢，遇到你很有趣，但我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the offer is open if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你改变主意，这个报价长期有效。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's me again. You mentioned a job before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，又是我。你之前提到过一份工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job's done, I am a lean, mean, mutie-killing machine. Am I scaring you now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作完成了，我是一个精干的、卑鄙的杀人机器。我现在吓到你了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you gonna give me the reward you promised? I'd hate if you came up...short on your payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你会给我你承诺的奖励吗？我讨厌你...在付款上出现拖延。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here is the key. Now fuck off!
Hi squeaky, need any more help indulging your Napoleon complex?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，吱吱，需要更多的帮助来放纵你的拿破仑情结吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, have you got anything good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你有什么好东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need anything, just give me a holler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要什么，跟我打个招呼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mistake. I thought you were selling weapons, not scavenged trash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我的错，我以为你卖的是武器，不是拆解的垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPancakeQuest01.BPPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbPancakeQuest01.BPGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed ZkbPancakeAmmoBenchBoxREF.Enable
Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想有一两件东西我可以给你看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, could you fix something for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你能帮我修点东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem, let me see what you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，让我看看你都有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just let me know what you need.
Alright, lets see what you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我们看看你有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a shout if you need anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, mind if I ask you something?
I take it this is a junk shop?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是一家废品店吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gathering junk is not the most exciting work, but it's a living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集垃圾并不是最令人兴奋的工作，但却是一种生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're down on your luck and need some caps, I buy just about anything. Of course, we also have plenty of things for sale too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你运气不好，需要一些瓶盖，我收任何东西。当然，我们也有很多东西出售。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR should head back to their lands, I'm sure their people miss them.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR应该回到他们的土地上，我肯定他们的人民想念他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that a tribal I saw wandering around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到的是一个四处游荡的部落吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We tolerate wasteland savages, as long as they respect our rules around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们容忍废土上的野蛮人，只要他们尊重我们的统治。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any dealings with Vegas this far north?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这么远的北方，你和拉斯维加斯有什么往来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Savages? You sound an awful lot like the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野蛮人？你的口气非常像NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's okay, 'cause I'm not one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，因为我不是他们中的一员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's about time a new customer showed up around here, I was getting sick of dealing with the same faces all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候来个新客户了，我已经厌倦了总是和同样的人打交道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Twice, both times I drank a lot of liquor and lost most of my caps at the card tables. In that order, now that I think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有两次，两次在牌桌上我都喝了很多酒，很多瓶盖，现在我想是这个顺序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know this area well?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这个地区很熟悉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just between you and me, I'm not sure I’ll ever learn everything there is to know about this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就你知我知，我不确定我能了解这个地方的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything around here that I should know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这附近有什么我应该知道的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what are you here for?
Okay, say no more, give me a shout if you need anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，不要再说了，如果你还需要什么就叫我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adventure, riches, revenge...you know, the usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒险、财富、复仇......你懂的，通常情况下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck with that, just don’t do anything crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，别做什么疯狂的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever come across the Legion around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这附近遇到过军团吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's Legion? Never seen them in these parts, so I couldn’t tell you much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒军团？从未在这些地方见过他们，所以我没什么能告诉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm done, I'll see you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我说完了，我们回头见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about a Vault around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这里什么避难所吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear rumors, thats about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到一些传言，就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Your guess is as good as mine, probably better. I wouldn't head in that direction if I were you, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的猜测和我的一样，也许更好。如果我是你，我不会往那个方向去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard a few rumors too, I might follow up on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也听到了一些谣言，我可能会跟进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I haven't heard anything. I should get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我什么都没听到，我应该回去工作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Direction? I didn't say what direction I was going, which way do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 方向？我没有说我要去哪个方向，你是说哪个方向？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh...um...okay, If you really want to know...yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦...呃...好吧，如果你真的想知道...是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif
No...well, not really. What do you want with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...嗯，算不上。你想对我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, I'm not after a guided tour, just some details, a location perhaps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我不是要听导游讲解，只是想知道一些细节，也许是一个地点？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, here's what I've got. It's your funeral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，这些是我的，后果自负。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why'd you pretend you didn't know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你为什么假装不知道呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's...not really a pleasant topic of conversation. Let's say we have our reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是一个令人愉快的话题，让我们说说我们的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That will do, I've seen better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就可以了，我见过更好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I don't have anything you like, well, tough. I don't do special orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有你喜欢的东西，那就难办了。我不做特别订单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm just telling it like it is.
You're not exactly making friends around here, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是来这儿交朋友的，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbHowieQuest01.JHPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbHowieQuest01.JHGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed ZkbHowieWorkBenchBoxREF.Enable
So, uh...nice place you've got here. Nice view of the water and the train tracks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，呃...你这地方不错。水面和火车轨道的景色不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kind of odd aren't you?
Do you know how to get to Zion?
Yeah, just follow the road north and keep an eye out for wildlife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，顺着路往北走，注意野生动物。
这地方是个廉价旅店吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you don't mind if I crash here for a bit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你不介意我在这里住上一段时间吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’ve been to Vault 66. An...interesting place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去过66号避难所，一个...有趣的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You're right, we did, I just wish things had turned out better, that's all in the past now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你是对的，我们做到了，我只是希望事情变得更好，现在一切都过去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing a lot of folk from around here came from that Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这里的很多人都是从那里来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Its not something I'm willing to discuss. Now, if you will excuse me...
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]如果你不介意的话，我现在不愿意讨论这个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the place was all screwed up, but why are you so tight lipped about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那地方被搞得一团糟，但你为什么对此事讳莫如深？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, that was rude, I didn't mean to sound ungrateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，那太无礼了，我不是故意要显得忘恩负义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would really appreciate it if I could borrow your workbench, I won't be long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能借用你的工作台，我将非常感激，我不会待很久。

ESP.ORIGINAL: 100 caps for killing this Ris character, you said? I'm in if the offer's still good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说过杀了丽斯给一百个瓶盖，如果还有效，我就加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come see me when you are done.

ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有自己的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Rumor is that Vaults are bad news, when the road swings north stay out of any train yards you come across.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]有传言说避难所很晦气，当公路向北延伸时，要远离你遇到的任何火车场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif
A man in your position makes it his business to hear things, how about you share the rumor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这种地位的人总是喜欢听传闻，不如你来分享传言吧？
[失败]那是你的问题，不是我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh c'mon, I can't believe you don't know anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，拜托，我不相信你什么都不知道

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, can I use your reloading bench? You would really be helping me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能用下你的弹药工作台吗？你真是帮了我大忙了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you need, here's a list. Let me know what grabs you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你需要什么，这是一张清单。让我知道什么能吸引你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some stuff fixed, can you manage that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要修理一些东西，你能处理吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm done, see you around.
Stay safe. And remember, you and your money are always welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全，记住，这里永远欢迎你和你的钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you can help me, I'm after some information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你能帮助我，我在寻找一些信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, information! Easy to transport, and often expensive. Are we trading?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，信息！运输简单，价格很贵，要交易吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burgess? I think I've already killed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯吉斯？我想我已经把他杀了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I guess secrets do have a sell by date, don't they? Forget it, it's south of here, you've walked past it. That's a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我想秘密是有保质期的，不是吗？算了吧，在南边，你已经走过了。这是一件好事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif
Never? Seems like there's been a ton of prospectors looking for one around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从来没有？好像有很多淘金客在这附近找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Well, if you already know, you don't need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好吧，如果你已经知道了，那就不需要我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't lie to me, I already know about it.
If ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay == 3 Player.AddItem Caps001 100 Set ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay to 4 Endif If ZkbBurgessTaskQuest01.Job02BRay == 1 SetStage ZkbBurgessTaskQuest01 90 Endif
So, what is there around these parts?
I meant, what's there to do in town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，在镇上有什么可做的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...And there’s the station hotel, bar, lounge and casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有车站酒店、酒吧、休息室和赌场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hotel, lounge, bar and casino? You mean the flop house?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒店、休息室、酒吧和赌场？你是说低价旅店吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are beds you can sleep in, that’s called a hotel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有床可以睡，那就叫酒店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a couch in there, so it’s a lounge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面有张沙发，所以是休息室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can get a drink there, that means it's a bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在那里喝上一杯，这意味着它是一个酒吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there are a pair of slot machines in there, so its a casino, at least if they worked anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里有一对老虎机，所以这是一个赌场，如果它们能用的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the rest of Hayford?
Well, the Myers live in the house on the south edge, they farm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，迈尔斯家住在南边的房子里，他们是农场主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the house north of here alone. The old boy that lived there booby trapped the place. He wasn't much of a people person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 远离北边的房子，住在那里的老男孩设了陷阱。他不太喜欢人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And be careful of the house in the north west corner as well. Burgess lives in there and he's mean and very unsociable. Fine qualities in a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对西北角的房子也要小心。伯吉斯住在那里，他很刻薄，非常不合群。这是一个人的优良品质。
还有...没什么值得一提的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice place. Really dig the "sandbag wallpaper" aesthetic you've got going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好地方。真的很喜欢你的 "沙袋墙纸 "美学。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you lived in a fireworks factory, you would understand why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你住在烟花工厂，你就会明白为什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don’t mind being shot at?
Well firstly they can’t shoot for shit, and secondly when they run out of ammo they have to come and buy it from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，他们枪法很烂，其次，当他们用光弹药的时候，他们不得不来我这里买。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait...you sell them ammo? To shoot at you? Isn't that dangerous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...你卖给他们弹药？让他们向你开枪？那不是很危险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck no, you haven't seen the crap I sell 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的不，你还没看到我卖的那些垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck no, you haven't seen the crap I sell 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的不，你还没看到我卖的那些垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take you don’t sell them any heavy ordnance, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你没有卖给他们任何重型武器吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course not, although recently they have become a pain in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然没有，虽然最近他们变得很麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A large group went through a while back and they didn't pay the toll, they just kicked the shit out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前一阵子有一大群人经过，他们没有付过路费，还把他们踢得屁滚尿流。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since then they haven’t been letting anyone through, and that’s bad for business. It’s Ris's fault, she's the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那以后，他们就不让任何人通过了，这对生意不利。这是丽斯的错，她是老大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, you wouldn't be interested in a job would you? You just have to kill her, if you're heading north you'll have to deal with her anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说，你不会对一份工作感兴趣吧？你只要杀了她就行了，如果你要往北走，无论如何你都要和她打交道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I look like a wandering gun for hire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看起来像个受雇的流浪枪手吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. 100 caps, once she is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，一百瓶盖，只要她死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of people come this way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的人来到这里呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Usual sort, one head, two legs, no money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 平常的那种，一个头，两条腿，没有钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you get any NCR up here?
Occasionally. They're like sand in a sandstorm, they get everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 偶尔，它们就像沙尘暴中的沙子，无处不在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They normally leave us alone, no taxes here for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们通常不会管我们，这里不给他们缴税。
有没有遇到过凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good money, bad dress sense and a nasty habit of nailing people to things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱好赚，穿衣品味差，还有把人钉在东西上的讨厌习惯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never seen them in these parts though.
Do you have any dealings with anyone from New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和新维加斯的人有来往吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some, I trade with a lot of people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一些，我和很多人做生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have the Boomers ever ventured up this way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大炮族曾经冒险走过这条路吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, probably too embarrassed about the name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，可能是名字太尴尬了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A classic wasteland example of a faction with a bigger arsenal than gene pool. Not a good combination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个典型的“废土”派系的例子，他们的兵工厂比基因库还大。这不是一个好的组合。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever heard of the Brotherhood of Steel?
Nah, I’m not into rock music.
Do the Followers of the Apocalypse ever travel up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者们是否曾经来过这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not here. Need to go further north or back to Vegas to find them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有，得往北走或者回维加斯去找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know anything about a Vault around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这附近有什么避难所吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I haven't heard anything about any Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，我没听说过什么避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Because I've been there. Vault 66.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？因为我去过那里，66号避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that right? Well, if you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样吗？好吧，既然你这么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why is everyone denying they know anything about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，为什么每个人都否认他们知道什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well why don't you tell me? You got one shot, get it right and I'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你为什么不告诉我？你有一次机会，说对了，我就告诉你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You trade with them...oh God, I don't want to think about what you give them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和他们交易...噢，上帝，我不愿意去想你给了他们什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're planning to take the Vault for yourselves! That's why you won't tell anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们打算把金库据为己有！这就是你们为什么不告诉别人的原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sold them your blood in exchange for protection!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把你的血卖给他们以换取保护！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're all descended from people who escaped the Vault, aren't you? Not proud of your history?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都是逃出避难所的人的后代，对吧？不为自己的历史感到骄傲吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you the smart one? Sure, some families around here escaped from there a while back, its not something they like to remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个聪明人。确实，这里的一些家庭前一阵子从那里逃出来，这不是他们想要记住的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're that interested, there are some old diary entries in that terminal behind me, read them if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你感兴趣的话，我身后的终端机里有一些旧日记，你想看就看吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You knew about the experiments and wanted in, so you could get immortality!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这些实验，并想参与其中，这样你就可以得到永生！

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, that's got it. Don't be so eager to sample dangerous substances in the future, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，搞定了。 以后不要急于尝试危险物质，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 2 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，治好我。这里是50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a bit chewed up, Doc. Can you help me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点被咬伤了，医生。你能帮我一下吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to get you treated quickly!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you heal my radiation? I've got a warm fuzzy feeling, but not in a good way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治好我的辐射吗？我有一种温暖的模糊的感觉，但不是好的感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We always make sure to keep an ample supply of Rad-Away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们总是确保有充足的辐特宁供应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any medical supplies to sell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么医疗用品要卖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, I thought this was a medical center, do you treat people here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松，我以为这是一个医疗中心，你在这里给人看病吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, if you are ever wounded I can treat you, for a fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如果你受伤了，我可以给你治疗，但要收费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have equipment here to treat most physical injuries, lacerations, broken bones, that sort of thing. We also carry a full supply of anti-toxins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里有设备可以治疗大部分的身体伤害，撕裂伤，骨折之类的。我们也有充足的抗毒素供应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also treat any form of radiation sickness you pick up out in the wastes, no matter what stage, save the last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还可以治疗你在废土中遇到的任何形式的辐射病，无论在哪个阶段，除了最后一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you don't give it away, you only treat people if they can pay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你不免费，你只在人们付得起钱的时候给他们治疗。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a fellow named Burgess, lives in a house on the north west corner, I may have mentioned him. He doesn't talk much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个叫伯吉斯的家伙，住在西北角的房子里，我可能提过他。他话不多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he has been asking a lot of questions and seems to be collecting information. Nothing specific, just local stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他一直在问很多问题，似乎在收集信息。也没有什么特别的，只是当地的一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's up to something and I want to know what its is. He's normally at the bar between 8 PM and midnight, he's more likely to talk in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在策划什么事，我想知道是什么。他通常在晚上8点到午夜之间在酒吧，他更有可能在那里聊天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alternatively - go give his place a spin, see what you can find. Don't get caught, don't kill anyone. Can you manage that? You'll be rewarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者去他家转转，看看能找到什么。别被抓，别杀人，能做到吗？你会得到回报的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay I'm in, what am I looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我加入了，我在找什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come see me when you're done.
Ris is dead. I'd bring you her head but I think this place is enough of a mess as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽斯已经死了。我想把她的头带给你，但我认为这个地方已经够乱的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay, I'm not blind to events, here is your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我不是瞎子，这是给你的奖励。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Setstage ZkbKillRisQuest01 90 Player.AddItem Caps001 100 Set ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay to 4
That's okay, I'm not blind to events. Would you by any chance be interested in some other work? I'll increase the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我不是什么都看不懂的人，你会对其他的工作感兴趣吗？我会增加奖励的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell no, just checking the ground rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然不是，只是检查一下基本规则。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought the Followers were meant to help people, not squeeze them for money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为追随者是为了帮助人们，而不是为了压榨他们的钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, 'cause that makes us so much better? Get out of my sight, I have nothing to say to you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，因为这让我们变得更好了吗？滚出我的视线，我跟你没什么可说的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbDoctorInceQuest01.DRIPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbDoctorInceQuest01.DRIGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
I've checked on Burgess and hacked his computer, he's working for the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我查过伯吉斯，黑了他的电脑，他在为NCR工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed him, didn't you? Idiot! Deal's off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你杀了他，对吧？白痴。交易结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was contracted by the NCR to look for a Vault around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他受NCR的委托，在这附近寻找避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and he was interested in places called "Ground House" and "Rita's Cafe"? Know them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他对叫做“地上小屋”和“丽塔咖啡”的地方感兴趣？ 听说过吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the latter, it's a place north east of here. Talk to a man called Poke if you ever get there, he might know about the former if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只知道后者，它在这里的东北方向。如果你去了那里，跟一个叫波克的人谈谈，如果你有兴趣的话，他可能知道前者情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, thanks for that, take this compass, its useful. And if you ever want to use my workbench, come on through, but don't do anything stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，谢谢你，带上这个指南针，它很有用。如果你想用我的工作台，那就来吧，但别做傻事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ris? The raider bitch with the goat on her head? I already killed her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽斯？那个头上顶着山羊的掠夺者婊子？我已经杀了她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what all that noise was? Well thanks, that helps a lot. Maybe you would be interested in something else? It would be worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是刚才的噪音吗？嗯，谢谢，这很有帮助。也许你会对别的事感兴趣？这是值得你花时间的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a shout if you need anything else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, don't cause me any trouble, OK?
All right, what can I get you then?
Give me a shout if you need anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That kid out front is a little shit, she needs to learn some manners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前面的那个孩子是个小混蛋，她需要学点些礼仪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell do you think you're talking to!? Keep talking like that, and your ass is gonna be in the gutter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你在跟谁说话？敢再这样说，你的屁股就会被塞进阴沟里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll shut up and keep my opinions to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我闭嘴，把我的观点留给自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough, is there anything else you need? I'm a busy woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你还需要什么吗？我是个忙碌的女人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you look like you just crawled out from under a rock, but I'm not judging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你看起来像刚从岩石下爬出来，但我不做评价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With what? Your razor sharp intellect? I'll take my chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用什么？你敏锐的智力？我会碰碰运气的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fame, riches, peace throughout the Mojave, but if you can't manage that I'll make do with some food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 名声、财富、整个莫哈韦地区的和平，但如果你做不到，我就吃点东西吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like a deal to me.
Food, why the fuck else would I be here? Sure as shit not for the service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 食物，为什么我他妈的会在这里？当然不是为了服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like we don't have enough problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像我们的问题还不够多似的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And maybe I should shoot you in the face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我应该朝你的脸开一枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
Missed me, sweet tits? How about you and me get to know each other better? In private?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想我了吗，可爱的奶子？你和我更好地了解对方如何？在私下里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I seriously doubt that, you've got about as much personality as a baked potato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很怀疑，你的个性就像一个烤熟的土豆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's cut out the small talk, just give me the menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不要再闲聊了，把菜单给我就行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just shut up and get me some food, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，给我弄点吃的，婊子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This job, what exactly would you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个工作，你到底需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This job requires a little more subtlety. It's a one time offer, take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份工作需要一点微妙的技巧，这是一份一次性的提议，接受或离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me the menu, or I'll throw you over the fucking balcony!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把菜单给我，否则我就把你从他妈的阳台上扔下去！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get the fuck out of here!
Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
Blue Ray said I should come and talk to you about "Ground House", you know what that is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 蓝光说我应该过来和你谈谈地上小屋，你知道这个地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. There's a locked door in a utility tunnel here that is rumored to lead to it. No idea what's in there, if anything, but it could be valuable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这里的综合管道里有一扇锁着的门，据说可以通往那里。不知道里面有什么，如果有的话，但可能很有价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it belongs to us. Give me one reason why I should give you a crack at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但它是属于我们的，给我一个理由，我为什么要给你一个机会?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] That's two reasons, I only asked for one, but you have a point. Tell you what, I'll give you a shot but you have to prove yourself first.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这是两个理由，我只问了一个，但你说的有道理。这样吧，我可以给你一次机会，但你得先证明自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't get in there and I have the access code. Can you afford to let this opportunity walk away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进不去，而我有访问密码。你想放过这个机会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] We've been sitting on this for a long time, and we can sit on it for as long as we like. I don't think you are right for the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我们在这个问题上已经拖延了很长时间了，我们想拖多久就拖多久。我认为你不适合这份工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you want to know what's in there? You can't just sit on it forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你难道不想知道里面有什么吗？你不能永远坐在它上面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything I should know before I go in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我进去之前，有什么我应该知道的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably, but damned if I know what it is. There is a rebreather next to the access terminal, take it if you want as there may be flooding in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能吧，但我不知道那是什么。终端机旁边有一个呼吸器，如果你想的话就拿去吧，因为那里可能灌满了水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Access is via this hotel, go up that shaft opposite my room then just follow your nose, you'll find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这家酒店进入，沿着我房间对面的竖井走，然后跟着你的鼻子走，你会找到它的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Disable ; Disables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Disable ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.MarkForDelete SetStage ZkbGHouseQuest01 22 ZkbRCHotelUtlDoor02REF.Unlock ZkbRCHotelUtlDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCHotelScafDoor01REF.Unlock
All right, I'll weed your garden and you cut me in on your secret little clubhouse thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我给你的花园除草，你把你的秘密小会所的事告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I've written the details down for you as listening isn't your strong point, come see me when you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我把细节都给你写下来了，因为听不是你的强项，搞定后来找我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote ZkbBlinderQuestANote1 Player.AddItem ZkbKeyRCCave 1 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 10 ; ZkbCave08Exit.Unlock ; cave door leading up to water field ; tidy up for unused thief sequence ZkbRCSheriffsDoorExtREF.Unlock ; Sheriffs office ext door ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.Disable ; Gets rid of companion warnings, no longer required ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.MarkForDelete ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.Disable ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.Disable ; removes trap switch for go to jail activator ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchAltREF.Enable ; replaces above trap switch with normal door switch ZkbRCThiefActREF.Disable ; Removes go to jail activator in utility tunnel ZkbRCThiefActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Enable ; Enables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Enable ZkbRCJailActREF.Disable ; Removes jail cell activator as it is no longer required ZkbRCJailActREF.MarkForDelete
Well I'm back, I've been to your "Ground House" and it was a complete waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我回来了，我已经去过你的 "地上小屋"，那完全是在浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it was actually there? Wow, I always thought that door went nowhere. But you didn't salvage much though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以它确实在那里？我一直以为那扇门是开不了的。但你没打捞出什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone beat you to it, probably just after the War. Nothing down there but bugs and ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人比你先到，可能是在战争结束后。下面除了虫子和食尸鬼，什么都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there were zombies down there after all? No treasure though? Well, it was worth a shot, guess we are all out of luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以那下面还是有食尸鬼的？但没有宝藏？好吧，这值得一试，看来我们都不太走运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I see your point, that's a nasty list. Tell you what, I've got this .45 submachine gun of mine, it's a tidy little asset.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我明白你的意思，这是个令人讨厌的名单。跟你说，我有把点45口径的冲锋枪，这可是笔不小的财产。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or this hunting rifle which is a copy of Angel's, she didn't need a spare, but it's top shelf. What's it to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者这把安琪儿的复制品猎枪，她不需要备用的，在顶层架子上，怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've put up with mutants, ghouls, bugs, and worst of all...Blue Ray. How about some compensation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经忍受了变种人、食尸鬼、虫子，以及最糟糕的...蓝光。给我一些补偿怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You think this is a game? where after every little quest there is a reward with some bonus points? Life sucks, deal with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你以为这是游戏？在每个小任务之后都有奖励和一些积分？生活就是这么糟，面对它吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did all the work, I took the risks and I want some compensation!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了所有的工作，承担了风险，我想要一些补偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, there you go, here is some ammo as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你，这还有一些弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem ZkbWeap45AutoSubmachineGun 1 80 Player.AddItem NVDLC02Ammo45Auto 50 100 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.Removeitem ZkbWeap45AutoSubmachineGun 1 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.Additem WithAmmoLeverActionShotgunNPC 1 SetStage ZkbGHouseQuest01 100
OK, there you go, here is some ammo as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你，这还有一些弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem ZkbWeapHuntingRifle 1 80 Player.AddItem Ammo308 20 100 SetStage ZkbGHouseQuest01 100
It's up top on the road, looks a bit like...a gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在道路的最上面，看起来有点像...门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just south of the lake, there's a barrier and couple of old cars stacked on top of one another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在湖的南面，有一堆障碍物和几辆旧汽车叠在一起。。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't guard it anymore, but it marks the edge of our territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不再守卫它，但它是我们领土的边界。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been sent by the CO, orders to do a quick sweep and clear of the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被中士派来的，命令我进行快速扫荡，清理道路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPvtDodds01Quest.Gatepass to 1 ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.Unlock ZkbRoute95ChkPointGateREF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.Disable ZkbDoddsGreetActREF.MarkForDelete
Thanks, I should be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，我现在应该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a shout if you need anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure I've got something you'll like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定有你会喜欢的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know why you want to do a thing like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道你为什么要做这样的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. Are you part of the farm? How's that going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不完全是。你是农场的一员吗？情况如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kind of like being a farmer.
What do you want with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想从我这里得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what can you tell me about this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你能告诉我关于这个地方的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My business is none of yours.
What do you know about the NCR?
The New California Republic's got the most power in Nevada, money, troops, you name it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新加州共和国在内华达州拥有最大的权力，金钱，军队，应有尽有。
有没有遇到过凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slavers, killers and all other kinds of trouble. The Legion are a bunch of savages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子，杀手和各种各样的麻烦。军团是一群野蛮人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for information on a Vault around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在寻找这附近的一个避难所的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and every other asshole around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和这里的每一个混蛋都是如此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've come to the wrong place, traveler.
I take it you don't think there is one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你不认为有这样的情况？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think so? That's odd, 'cause I've been there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么认为吗？那就奇怪了，因为我已经去过那里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't talk about that. Next topic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不谈这个。下一个话题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kind of odd, aren't you?
You know where to find me.
See you when I see you.
Do you know that ghoul, Burgess? I'm kind of curious about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识那个食尸鬼伯吉斯吗？我对他有点好奇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you mind if I ask why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意我问一下原因吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a ghoul fan, I take it? I'm just trying to find out what he's up to, do you know him at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你不是食尸鬼的粉丝吧？我只是想知道他在做什么，你认识他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that...thing...just as much as anyone else around here. It mostly keeps to itself, which is just fine by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，这件事和这里的其他人一样，基本上都是保密的，这对我来说很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take it that's a "no", then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这是一个 "不 "字，然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good riddance to it is all I have to say, never liked having it around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是摆脱它很好，我从来都不喜欢它在身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're seriously charging for this crap? I could find better stuff lying on the side of the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的要为这种垃圾收费吗？我可以在路边找到更好的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't waste my time with troublemakers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会把时间浪费在麻烦制造者身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you go and join the rest of the human trash across the river?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你不去加入河对岸的其它人类垃圾？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbKarenMyersQuest01.KMPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbKarenMyersQuest01.KMGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
I thought the Followers were a bit more generous than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为天启追随者会更慷慨一点呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My supplies are rather limited and we can only get more by trading, which requires money, money you don't have. Come back when you have some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的补给相当有限，我们只能通过贸易来获得更多，这需要钱，而你没有。等你有了钱再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, I have money, I was just asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我有钱，我只是问问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So who around here shoots at you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这里有谁向你开枪呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a gang up the road and across the bridge. Junkies, losers and occasionally target practice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路的那头和桥的那头有一伙人。瘾君子，失败者，偶尔打靶练习。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I generally don't worry about them too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一般不怎么担心他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal unlocked with Burgess's Ground House Note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用伯吉斯的地上小屋笔记解锁终端

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Unarmed skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
But, just because you feel like you can strangle a Yao Guai doesn't make trying it a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的徒手格斗技能永久增加3点。
但是，你觉得你可以掐死一个妖怪，并不意味着尝试它是一个好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Survival skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Is there nothing you can't learn in a Vault?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的生存技能永久增加了3点。
在避难所里就没有学不到的东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is to glean from this book, your Speech skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
So you can smell it, but can you dish it out?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的口才技能永久增加3点。
所以，你能闻到它，但你能把它拿出来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is to know from this book, your Medicine skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Now you know there are better ways to treat cuts and lacerations than with a red hot spoon.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的医疗技能永久增加3点。
现在你知道有比用烧红的勺子更好的方法来治疗伤口和裂伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe your companion(s) should wait outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你的同伴们应该在外面等着

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are some notes on the black board. Do you want to log them in your Pipboy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑板上有一些笔记。你想把它们记录在你的Pip-Boy里吗？
是的，它们可能是相关的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, do I look like a secretary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我看上去像个秘书吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal Unlocked with Blue Ray's Obscure Password
ESP.TRADUIT: 用蓝光的晦涩密码解锁终端机

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Barter skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Shyster.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的交易技能永久增加3点。
卑鄙小人

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Energy Weapons skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
And you can cook the deer at the same time!
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的能量武器技能永久增加3点。
而且你还可以同时烹调鹿肉!

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Explosives skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Not as eco friendly as a fishing rod, but it's a bit late to worry about that now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的爆炸技能永久增加3点。
不像鱼竿那样环保，但现在担心这个有点晚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Guns skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
It you are going to shoot something, shoot it properly.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的枪械技能永久增加3点。
如果你要射东西，就好好射。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Lockpick skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
And it might improve your hair style as well.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的撬锁技能永久增加3点。
而且，它还可能改善你的发型。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Melee Weapons skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
And you also realize Mister Punch was really on to something.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的近战武器技能永久增加3点。
你也意识到，潘趣先生真的有点东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Repair skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Does anyone else remember Blue Peter? Now THERE you could learn something.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的修理技能永久增加3点。
还有人记得蓝彼得吗？现在你可以在那里学到一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is to know from this book, your Science skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
You will never look at a light bulb the same way again.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的科学技能永久增加了3点。
你永远不会再用同样的方式看待灯泡了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is to know from this book, your Sneak skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Wait until you see the whites of their eyes, assuming they are not wearing sunglasses.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的潜行技能永久增加3点。
等到你看到他们的眼白，假设他们没有戴太阳镜

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greg seems to be quiet enough, but keep your eye on Elaine. If she gets any worse we are going to have to move her downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格雷格似乎很安静，但要注意伊莱恩。如果她的情况再恶化，我们就要把她搬到“楼下”去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi Chef, I went through the kid's stuff looking for a label to check his name and judging from what I found he might be called Spencer or Max but most likely Linda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，大厨，我查看了孩子们的东西，想找一个标签来检查他的名字，从我发现的名字来看，他可能叫斯宾塞或马克斯，但最有可能是琳达。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is anyone ever going to fix this terminal? It's locked out for some reason and has been like this as long as I remember. I keep having to get up off my ass to check the instruments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人能搞定这个终端机吗？由于某种原因它被锁起来了，从我记事起就这样。我总是得起床去检查仪器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without a compass you lose a little spatial awareness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有指南针，你就会失去一些空间意识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a compass you get a better understanding of the terrain. Your PER is increased by 1.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了指南针，你可以更好地了解地形，+1感知。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Blue, If Tim ever returns and finds you have turned his house into a distillery, he's gonna kill you. - Karen
Don't worry about it Karen, he wouldn't. He would be too drunk! - Blue Ray
ESP.TRADUIT:
蓝光，如果蒂姆回来发现你把他家变成了酿酒厂，他会杀了你的。- 凯伦
别担心，凯伦，他不会的。他会喝得酩酊大醉的。 - 蓝光

ESP.ORIGINAL:
June,
Can you get Harry in the Machine Shop to cut me a spare key to the Supervisor's office? And tell him not to leave it lying around, they keep guns in there remember.
David
ESP.TRADUIT:
琼,
你能让机械车间的哈里给我弄把监管办公室的备用钥匙吗。告诉他别乱放，里面有枪，别忘了。
- 大卫

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal unlocked with Vault 66 Mainframe Archive Entry 45187
ESP.TRADUIT: 用66避难所大型计算机存档条目45187解锁终端

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Someone has scribbled over this monument's inscription with the words: "Dedicated to any modder who ever wondered where his life went."
You ponder what this could possibly mean.
ESP.TRADUIT:
有人在这块纪念碑的碑文上潦草地写下了这样一句话："献给所有曾经想知道自己的生活去了哪里的Modder"。
你想了想这可能是什么意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is a "modder" anyway?
You're feeling lucky - maybe someone is watching over you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你感觉很幸运 - 也许有人在保佑你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't feel quite so lucky now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在感觉不那么幸运了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There appears to be no power.

Dave
If you're looking for your key, I left it the yard office, in the ashtray above Jill's desk, next to the Hula Girl.
ESP.TRADUIT:
戴夫
如果你在找你的钥匙，我把钥匙留在院子办公室了，在吉尔桌子上面的烟灰缸里，就在草裙舞女郎旁边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water pressure in the cistern is far too high to let you open the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蓄水池里的水压高得让你打不开门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The light causes the strange Vaulter to panic and flee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如此明亮的光使得避难所居民惊慌失措，四处逃窜！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bright light drives the strange Vault Dweller over the edge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 明亮的光线把避难所居民逼到了悬崖上！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ultraviolet light confuses the strange Vaulter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 紫外线使奇怪的避难所居民感到困惑！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Leave this stuff, it's too risky collecting it straight from the stores anyway. We don't need that missile launcher and I've put that bloody great machine gun you stole in with a load of kitchen stuff upstairs. No one will find it, only the robots come in here, mostly.
Charlie has located a better escape stash, one tailor made for our needs. And the irony is beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT:
把这些东西留下吧，直接从商店拿回来太冒险了。我们不需要那个导弹发射器，我把你偷来的那把该死的大机关枪和一堆厨房用品放在楼上了。没有人会发现它，只有机器人才会来这里，大部分时候。
查理找到了一个更好的藏身处，为我们量身定做的。讽刺是是它很美。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The current is too strong to swim that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水流太急，不能往那边游。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are some cables over to the left of that door down there. You might just be able to jump onto that tiny ledge, hang on to the cables and open it, if you're lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那扇门的左边有几根电缆。如果你擅长的话，你可以跳到那个小窗台上，抓住缆绳，打开它。如果你擅长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have already killed Doctor Fent!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经杀死了芬特博士！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have discovered the outcome of John Doyle's expedition. Do you wish to continue the quest to learn the fate of all the crew?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经发现了约翰·道尔探险的结果。你想继续探索，了解所有成员的命运吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, screw it, life goes on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，管它呢，生活还得继续。
